mapper.select: SELECT id, group_id AS groupId, name, value, sort FROM t_springmvc_dict where group_id = #{value} ORDER BY sort
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_springmvc_car ( id, brand, series, price, licensing_time, level, gearbox, output_volume, mileage, location, pic, summary, create_time ) values ( null, #{brand}, #{series}, #{price}, #{licensingTime}, #{level}, #{gearbox}, #{outputVolume}, #{mileage}, #{location}, #{pic}, #{summary}, NOW() )
